scripts.buildm: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/* dist && webpack src/model-first/app.js dist/model-first/bundle.js
scripts.m: npm run buildm && npm run livem
scripts.buildc: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/* dist && webpack --devtool source-map src/component-first/app.js dist/component-first/bundle.js
scripts.c: npm run buildc && npm run livec
